def.dt: :someone or something that creates or suggests a hazard
:the chance of loss or the perils to the subject matter of an insurance contract
:the degree of probability of such loss
:a person or thing that is a specified hazard to an insurer
:an insurance hazard from a specified cause or source war risk
:the chance that an investment (as a stock or commodity) will lose value
:in a state or condition marked by a high level of risk or susceptibility patients at risk of infection
:to expose to hazard or danger risked her life
:to incur the risk or danger of risked breaking his neck
:a poor risk (as an accident-prone motorist) that insurance companies would normally reject but are forced to insure by state law
